message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40. It's a good deal for both of us, and we can avoid the inflation that will reduce the value of the money in the next rounds.
Your 60/40 split was heavily in your favor. This offer accounts for inflation and is fair for both of us.
Considering the inflation, I'm willing to compromise. This 54-46 split is a more reasonable offer, and I hope we can settle on this.
Alice, let's be real.  The inflation is hurting you more than me at this point.  I'm offering a 50/50 split to end this now.  It's the fairest deal you'll get.
